document_data.name: Illowarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Illowarr''' was a [[ranger]] of [[Turmish]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/105/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: More Fabled Treasures of the Land of Turmish|7}}
document_data.History: Illowarr met a [[dryad]] near a stand of [[shadowtop]] trees ''circa'' [[1270 DR]] and became infatuated with her. For the rest of his days, he lived here amongst the trees. The village of [[Illowwood]] grew up on the site.
document_data.Abilities: Illowarr acquired the powers to travel through trees, as with the ''[[pass plant]]'' spell, and create a ''[[plant door|tree door]]'', as often as he needed. These were possibly granted by his dryad lover.
